overview: Fayza returns to the country after the death of her husband Juma, so the mayor tries to control her, to seize her money. He asks her to stay in his house, and tries to get close to her, so his wife finds out about the matter, and leaves him the house. Her husband's brothers try to get close to her after they know that she wants to sell the land that she inherited. She gets to know and fall in love with the irrigation engineer, Adel.
title: The Network
